name: Dark and Cleaner IMDB
description: A mostly completed, and therefore, sadly imperfect rewrite to darken and clean the IMDB website. Not one of my finer works, but hey, it works...

user.name: 8cr14mov
user.about: I'm a pretty stand up guy. Yeah? My styles aren't perfect, but they work pretty well. At least, that's my opinion. Honestly, if you ever need something updated, or there's an issue, feel free to contact me about it.

additional_info:
Changelog:

    Version 0.3

  • Add fluidity to main page

  • Blend colors better and improve buttons/ highlights

  • Start fixing discrepancies

  • Change opacity on image header/footer display

    • Version 0.2

  • Improve buttons on message board list

  • Remove category borders

    • Version 0.1

  • Merge and update message board threads

  • Modify headers

Future:

  • Improve alignments of certain objects/ elements

  • Tinker with remaining discrepancies
